attributes.action: reduce by half the ammount of water charges in the south west of england
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the ratepayers of the south west pay the highest water charges in england.
this financial year south west water have anounced a massive increase of 16%.
this obscene ammount connot be justified.
people of the south west must unite and oppose this extortionate levy.
do not allow them to bleed us dry any more.we should turn the taps on them!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
